title: Introduction to Prehacks
description: A quick introduction to the Prehacks event as a whole, what we have planned for the week, and a brief talk about PickHacks.

title: Intro to Web Development
description: In this workshop, we'll provide a brief introduction to some tools that may be helpful to use in your hack this weekend. We'll be going over the basics of HTML, CSS, JavaScript. We'll also introduce ReactJS which you can use to create web applications.

title: Intro to Web Scraping
description: Workshop attendees will learn the basics of web scraping using the JavaScript library puppeteer. At the end of the workshop, attendees will have a json file full of data that will fuel a course ranking website.

title: Walkthrough of a Hackathon Weekend
description: Here, participants can see what an entire weekend at a hackathon looks like, from attending the opening ceremony, watching workshops, and playing games to finally submitting their projects.

title: General Q&A
description: If you have any questions at all, you can ask them here! From where to submit your hack to which of the PickHacks board members is the best at Valorant, this is your place to figure out anything and everything you'd want to know.

title: Networking Event
description: Join us to play games and talk meet fellow hackers, organizers, and sponsors! We'll play games like Skribblio and Among Us, and get to know one another before the main event.
